name: comicopds
description: ComicOPDS is a self-hosted OPDS server tailored for comic book libraries. It allows browsing and serving comic book files through OPDS-compatible readers and apps using a streamlined web back end.
features: OPDS Server: Standard protocol for comic book distribution. Compatible with all major readers.
Comic Library Management: Organize and serve your comic collection efficiently. Streamlined browsing experience.
Reader Compatibility: Works with popular OPDS-compatible apps. Read on any device.
Web Backend: Simple administration through web interface. Easy configuration and management.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your comic library. Privacy-focused solution.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements for smooth operation. Perfect for home servers.
